name: 3 2 1 Boom
description:
Tanks, except everything only happens once every "ten" seconds!

Host a private game and invite up to three friends with a code. Need someone to play with? Find a friendly stranger on our public Discord server.

How To Play
  • Move with WASD
  • Aim by pointing the mouse where you want to fire
  • Mind the timer counting down around your cursor
  • When the time runs out:
    • Enemy tanks will be revealed
    • All tanks will fire
    • All existing bombs will explode
    • The timer will refill and begin counting down again
  • Stay away from all bombs and explosions!
Game Setup
  1. One player should click Host. When the lobby is created, the join code will be copied to your clipboard. Share this with the other players.
  2. All other players can type in the code and click Join.
  3. The host will see a list of settings presets to choose from. They can also tweak the game settings to their liking
  4. All players including the host should type in their name and pick their color. White or gray are not recommended, pick something vibrant!
  5. When all players are ready, the host should click Start Game
  6. The game will cycle through all the levels randomly for as long as you want.
  7. To add or remove players or to change the game settings, all players should exit the game and re-launch it.
